Articles.Content: I don't remember the name site name, but in the past it was one not endorsed by the KSP team. Don't know why. It had old KSP crafts and such. What sites exists, besides Spaceport ? Because i'm stuck with 0.15 and 0.16 KSP versions.

I think it was KSP.net as it's what pops up when I try to find this addon.

There was another I think, that was shut down by the owners as they couldn't secure their site from abuse.
Not KSP.net, I can't remember what it was called now.
